title.en: Hitotsu no Futon ni Yaro ga 2-ri.

description.en: I'm gonna lose my virginity during the school trip! ...Or so I thought...... But turns out my virginity's being taken instead! I'm forced to climax...... And why's the culprit in my bed!? I was looking forward to this school trip, but I hate the fact that the popular Tsukasa is in my group. Although, something good came out of it - the girls come to our room at night! I'm totally in the mood, until the teacher comes to check on us. When everyone climbs into bed and pretends to be asleep...... Somebody wriggles in with me! Plus, they get real close and touch me down there...... When I can't take it anymore and lift the sheets, it's Tsukasa......!
